General.Name: United Wire Factories Company
General.Description: United Wire Factories Company produces and markets steel wire products for the construction and building, civil, and industrial sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers steel rebars, wire mesh, block ladder mesh, nails, fences, barbed and concertina wires, and tying wires. It also provides bailing wires, cloth hangers, welded wires mesh, staples clips, and black annealed wires, as well as welded wire mesh rolls; and black drawn, galvanized, PVC coated, and deformed wires. In addition, the company offers products for construction and housing projects. United Wire Factories Company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
